trigger.name: License server SLK not available on {HOST.NAME}

item.name: License server data connections ID list
License server data licences ID list
License server data sessions ID list

item_prototype.name: Connections {#ID_CONN} Expired
item_prototype.description: Indicates that the connection's lifetime has expired.

item_prototype.name: Connections {#ID_CONN} ExpireTime
item_prototype.description: The time when the connection lifetime expires

item_prototype.name: Connections {#ID_CONN} IsServer
item_prototype.description: A sign of the server process of the 1C:Enterprises

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} BlankKeyNo
item_prototype.description: S/N of the hardware media, if the software key is installed on it

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} Expired
item_prototype.description: Indicates that the validity period has expired

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} Flags
item_prototype.description: Flags of functionality in binary form

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} IndustrySupportDate
item_prototype.description: The start date of the ITS Industry service for this reg. number

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} IndustrySupportPeriod
item_prototype.description: The validity period of the ITS Industry service in days

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} ProductVersionName
item_prototype.description: The name of the version, if installed in the Center Licensing

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} Recovered
item_prototype.description: Indicates that the key was recovered by the recovery team.

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} ServiceType
item_prototype.description: The type of service when using the key in special 1C: 0 - services is the usual use case. 1 - Demo server 2 - GRM 3 - Fresh 4 - ...

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} SupportDate
item_prototype.description: The start date of the ITS agreement for this registration number

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} SupportPeriod
item_prototype.description: Срок действия договора ИТС в днях

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} UpdateDate
item_prototype.description: Date and time of the last update

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} Version
item_prototype.description: Version of the internal software or file format

item_prototype.name: Key {#ID_KEY} Workable
item_prototype.description: Indicates that the device is working properly, returns false if the device is defective or the computer ID has changed.

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} ComputerName
item_prototype.description: Computer name of the information database

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} Expired
item_prototype.description: Indicates that the session lifetime has expired.

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} ExpireTime
item_prototype.description: The time when the session lifetime expires

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} InfoBaseConnectionStr
item_prototype.description: Connection String of the information database

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} SessionConnection
item_prototype.description: ID of the connection that created the session

item_prototype.name: Session {#ID_SES} UserName
item_prototype.description: Name of the Information Database user

macro.description: The IP address of the license server
The Port of the license server
